name: shopworn
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
US (UK shop-soiled) If goods sold in shops are shopworn, they are slightly dirty or damaged and therefore reduced in price
US If a story or joke is shopworn, it is boring or not interesting because it is so familiar to people.
